scripts.clean: rimraf -f build && rimraf -f browser && mkdir browser
scripts.terser: terser -c passes=2 -m --sequences 40 build/rollup/peggy.umd.js > browser/peggy.min.js && terser -c passes=2 -m --sequences 40 --module build/rollup/test.umd.js > docs/js/test-bundle.min.js && terser -c passes=2 -m --sequences 40 --module build/rollup/benchmark.umd.js > docs/js/benchmark-bundle.min.js
scripts.audit: npm run test && npm run benchmark
scripts.make: npm run parser && npm run ts && npm run rollup && npm run terser
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run set_version
scripts.build-notidy: node ./tools/announce "Static source analysis" && npm run lint && node ./tools/announce "Setting up the build" && npm run setup && node ./tools/announce "Making libraries" && npm run make && node ./tools/announce "Running Audits" && npm run audit && node ./tools/announce "Creating distributions" && npm run headers && npm run deploy && node ./tools/announce "Complete!"
scripts.build: npm run build-notidy && npm run tidy
